trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_00<tab>The look of resolve in Marsak's eyes tells you the time for battle draws near.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_01<tab>The rebirth of Gunnhildr's Blades has sparked a fire within the Resistance, their forces drawing ever closer to Castrum Lacus Litore. Having recently reclaimed Utya's Aegis, an outpost on the southern front, Marsak has asked Sjeros to escort you there, that you might assess the situation for yourself.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_02<tab>With little preamble, Sjeros agrees to guide you to Utya's Aegis, where Bajsaljen plans to introduce you to a rather remarkable group of soldiers.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_03<tab>Bajsaljen is proud to present to you the new Gunnhildr's Blades, though the members present do not comprise the guard in its entirety. The remaining members have already taken to the field, laboring to advance the front line toward the castrum. Having thus explained the situation, it occurs to Bajsaljen that you have yet to see the fortress with your own eyes. Seeking to rectify this, he invites you to look out over the battlefield and behold the object of their struggles.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_04<tab>As you look upon the castrum, towering in the distance, Bajsaljen speaks to you of their initiative to reclaim it, Operation Eagle's Nest. Before you join his troops in the field, however, he asks that you speak with Mikoto.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_05<tab>You find Mikoto in the company of Misija, and they have exciting news to share─an analysis of the crystal focus has proven that it can be recharged. The problem, however, is the means to do so requires infiltrating imperial territory. Nevertheless, plans to restore the crystal focus are well underway. Plans that will require your assistance to succeed.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SEQ_06<tab>Mikoto appears fearful of the dangers yet to come, but she understands that you both must do what needs be done. She bids you safe travels as you ready to brave the Bozjan southern front.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Sjeros.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_TODO_01<tab>Make for the Bozjan southern front and speak with Bajsaljen.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Bajsaljen.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Mikoto.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mikoto.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MARSHAK_000_000<tab>It is good to see you, my friend. Though it came at great cost, I am pleased to say Master Gerolt has succeeded in reforging the weapons of Gunnhildr's Blades. Indeed, the queen's illustrious guard has at last been reborn.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MARSHAK_000_001<tab>When the deed was done, word quickly spread to every faction of the Bozjan Resistance. As we had hoped, it has reaffirmed their resolve to press on and see our home returned to its former glory.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MARSHAK_000_002<tab>In fact, our troops have already reclaimed Utya's Aegis, an outpost in the Bozjan southern front. When you are ready, I would ask you make for the front lines to better assess the situation for yourself. Sjeros can show you the way.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SERAOUSH_000_030<tab>Ah, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I've been expecting you. If you'll come with me.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>You may now travel to the Bozjan southern front. The battle for Bozja may be joined in parties of up to eight players, or solo.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Please be advised that all ventures to the front lines of battle are item level synced. Gear exceeding an item level of <var 20 E802 /var> will be adjusted.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_060<tab>I am glad you could join us, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and not a moment too soon.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_100_060<tab>Allow me to introduce to you Gunnhildr's Blades!

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_101_060<tab>High mage Xeven, master of flames. The fury of his art rivals even the fieriest hells. Isolde, the eagle eye. In brightest day or darkest night, no enemy will escape her sight. Stanik, the unwavering blade of Bozja. The foes dashed against his shield are beyond counting.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_102_060<tab>Velibor, the baleful blade. His unbridled fury can fell entire cadres with a single stroke. Aggie, the iron fist of Bozja. A young prodigy whose martial skills put even those most seasoned veterans to shame. Blaz, the merciful blade. No foe, however terrible, will dissuade his blade from finding its mark.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_103_060<tab>Rest assured, this is not the guard in its entirety. A number have already taken to the field and would benefit greatly from your presence, if you are willing.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_061<tab>With Gunnhildr's Blades and the Warrior of Light leading the charge, it is only a matter of time before Castrum Lacus Litore is ours.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_062<tab>Speaking of which, I believe you have yet to see the castrum. If you'll follow me, I'll show you the object of our struggle here on the southern front.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_XEVEN_000_070<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. It is an honor and privilege to make your acquaintance. I very much look forward to fighting at your side in the days to come.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_ISOLDE_000_071<tab>Pleased to meet you, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. When the battle is joined, rest assured Gunnhildr's Blades will be at your back.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_STANIK_000_072<tab>Hahaha, at last we meet, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Let us give the imperials a good thrashing, yes?

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BLAZ_000_073<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. You honor us with your presence. Though my ancestors hail from Doma, Bozja is my home. With you at our side, I am confident we will see it free.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_VELIBOR_000_074<tab>It is good to have you with us, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. A warrior after my own heart, if the tales of your renown are true. When the fighting starts, I will be sure not to get in your way. I trust you will show me the same courtesy?

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_AGGIE_000_075<tab>An honor to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Never in my wildest dreams did I think I would be chosen for such a duty, but I won't let you down! Promise!
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_090<tab>There it is. Castrum Lacus Litore, to use the Garlean moniker.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_091<tab>Its true name is Alermuc, which means “eagle” in Bozjan, as they too once made their home in these mountains. To our people they are a symbol of strength and good fortune, both of which were sorely needed when the Empire first invaded.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_092<tab>But we needn't dwell on past failings. Now we have a chance to reclaim what is rightfully ours. To remind the people what it is we stand to gain, I have chosen to call this initiative “Operation Eagle's Nest.”
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_093<tab>Like the great eagle we must strike hard and swift. And with you at our side, I have no doubt we shall see this through to a glorious end.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_094<tab>But before you rush into battle, I believe Mikoto wished to discuss the crystal focus with you. Good tidings, perhaps?
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_BAISHAEN_000_100<tab>Mikoto requested you speak with her as soon as possible. Something to do with the crystal focus, I believe.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_130<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_131<tab>I have rather exciting news to share. As you may recall, the energies of the crystal focus were spent on our exploration of Cid's memories.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_132<tab>After careful analysis, we have concluded that it can, in fact, absorb aether in a similar fashion to the auracite we discovered in Ivalice.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_133<tab>This assumes, of course, we have a suitable source of energy matching its aetherial frequency.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_134<tab>And therein lies the problem. Crystals bearing such a specific aetherial signature are quite rare. We could never hope to amass the quantities needed.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_135<tab>Were we to locate an aether current of the correct frequency, however, charging the focus would be a matter of course. Unfortunately, such currents exist only in regions of Bozja rife with imperials.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_136<tab>Mikoto wished to wait until the fighting died down, but as I explained to her before, time is a luxury we can ill afford.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_137<tab>I'm sure you understand better than anyone that the bloodshed will only cease when a victor is decided, the death toll climbing ever higher on both sides.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_138<tab>The horrors of this war weigh heavy on the hearts of our people.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_139<tab>A burden which could be eased were we able to employ the crystal focus, healing wounds not of the flesh, but of the mind.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MEESIYA_000_140<tab>Plans to locate an aether current are well underway, but I suspect your help would see them expedited. Might we ask for your assistance in this endeavor?
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_141<tab>Pressed for time as we are, Cid has already begun work on a monitoring device to locate a sufficient source of aether.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_142<tab>I would join him and see to the final preparations. In the meantime, I would ask the two of you to investigate a location I believe to be near an aether current.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MARSHAK_000_143<tab>Sorry for interrupting, but a few of our soldiers wished to have a quick word before you depart. I expect their intelligence will prove useful when you're in the field.

TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_RESISTANCERECORDER_000_150<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Might I speak with you before you leave for the southern front? Of course, I can wait until you've concluded your business with Miss Mikoto.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_180<tab>I appreciate your willingness to help, but must you always place yourself in such peril? ...I'm sorry. I understand you only do what must be done.
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_MIKOTO_000_181<tab>We all have our roles to play, and I promise to fulfill mine as best I can. Stay safe out there, won't you?
TEXT_LUCKSA101_03941_SYSTEM_000_190<tab>Speak with the Resistance secretariat or Sjeros to learn more about battle on the Bozjan southern front.
